affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Pure
attrib:
MANA POOL TO DAMAGE: 6% / 7% / 8% / 9%
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 100 / 200 / 300 / 400
cmb: MANA COST: 100/100/100/100
desc:
Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.
Arcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.
lore: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
name: obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb

attrib:
INTELLIGENCE STEAL: 4 / 7 / 10 / 13
STEAL DURATION: 50
PRISON DURATION: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
cmb:
MANA COST: 120/140/160/180
COOLDOWN: 18/16/14/12
desc: Places a target allied or enemy hero into an astral prison.  The hidden hero is invulnerable and disabled.  When cast on an enemy Hero, Harbinger temporarily steals intelligence from that hero.
notes:
If used on an ally, no intelligence is stolen.
Imprisoned units are hidden and invulnerable.
Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.
lore: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
name: obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment

attrib:
RADIUS: 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000
BASE MANA: 75 / 150 / 225 / 300
RESTORE CHANCE: 40%
desc: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore 10%/15%/20%/25% of its mana pool. Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
notes: Other than Arcane Orb, most skills without cooldowns cannot trigger Essence Aura.
lore: The crystals of the Outworld produce arcane power, and the Harbinger channels it into the world of mortals.
name: obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura

attrib:
RADIUS: 375 / 475 / 575
RANGE: 600 / 650 / 700
DIFFERENCE DAMAGE MULTIPLIER: 8 / 9 / 10
INTELLIGENCE THRESHOLD: 10 / 30 / 50
SCEPTER RANGE: 700 / 750 / 800
SCEPTER DIFFERENCE DAMAGE MULTIPLIER: 9 / 10 / 11
cmb:
MANA COST: 175/250/325
COOLDOWN: 160
desc:
Deals damage to enemy Heroes in an area of effect based on the difference between Harbinger and the affected Hero's intelligence. If the Hero takes less than the damage threshold, that Hero loses 75% of its current mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped in Astral Imprisonment. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse has no effect.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Aghanim's Scepter Sanity's Eclipse always triggers the mana drain.
lore: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.
name: obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse
